U

updateProductsFile() - Method in class server.ServerController
This method uploads the storage file at the end of every client session by fully re-writing the storage file.
updateProductsLists() - Method in class server.ServerController
This method updates the two available products list (products for sale and products owned by the client).

This method handles the product upload, an event triggered by the user to upload a product.
uploadProduct(String) - Method in class server.ServerController
This method upload a product by writing it on the products list, then the method updateProductsLists is used.
